# Stalker Rules These rules apply at all times, including between rounds. Some may contain explanations as well as rules. Admins have the final say as the rules can't cover every possible instance.
- [textlink="1. Don't be an asshole" link="RuleC1Stalker"] - [textlink="2. No Exploiting or Cheating" link="RuleC2Stalker"] - [textlink="3. No ERP" link="RuleC3Stalker"] - [textlink="4. Character Customization" link="RuleC4Stalker"] - [textlink="5. IC in OOC" link="RuleC5Stalker"] - [textlink="6. Roleplay Standards" link="RuleC6Stalker"] - [textlink="7. Fear Roleplay" link="RuleC7Stalker"] - [textlink="8. Do not RDM and Zone Rulings" link="RuleC8Stalker"] - [textlink="9. PvP and PvE Rules" link="RuleC9Stalker"] - [textlink="10. Robbing and Looting" link="RuleC10Stalker"] - [textlink="11. Faction Rules and Information" link="RuleC11Stalker"] - [textlink="12. Alliances and Wars" link="RuleC12Stalker"] - [textlink="13. You're going to die. A lot." link="RuleC13Stalker"]
